alert.note: Alert for Middlesex; Worcester (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 21 at 4:25PM EDT until July 21 at 5:30PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: The National Weather Service in Boston/Norton has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Worcester County in central Massachusetts... Northwestern Middlesex County in northeastern Massachusetts... * Until 530 PM EDT. * At 425 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Townsend, or 7 miles northeast of Fitchburg, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. * Locations impacted include... Pepperell, Groton, Lunenburg, Townsend, Dunstable and Ashby. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
